attributes.action: Limit wefare benifits to EU/non EU migant workers and familys
attributes.additional_details:
We need to limit the wefare benifits to EU/Non EU migrant workers and there families for a limited time until they have cotributed to the state ie NI and tax
so as not to drain the state of much needed funds to  clear our national dept any funds saved could be used to reenstate the fuel allowance for the pensioners
